title: Weekly Product Pulse: Stability, Fees, and Support Insights (Dec 1-7)
overview: This week's pulse highlights user concerns primarily around app stability, specifically frequent glitches and critical failures. Fees and charges continue to be a significant pain point impacting user profitability and platform loyalty. Customer support feedback remains mixed, indicating both excellent service and areas for improvement.

themes.name: Glitches & Bugs
themes.summary: Negative sentiment persists regarding frequent system glitches, inaccurate data displays, and critical app failures impacting overall usability and trust.

themes.name: Fees & Charges
themes.summary: Users express strong dissatisfaction with perceived high brokerage fees, automatic deductions, and the significant portion of profits consumed by various charges, driving some to consider alternatives.

themes.name: Customer Support
themes.summary: Feedback on customer support is varied, with some users praising ease of understanding and smooth processes, while others report negative experiences, suggesting inconsistency in service quality.

quotes: I am unable to open my app it's not responding (Glitches & Bugs)
if you get 100rs profit 50-60rs will be taxes. (Fees & Charges)
worst service go to zerodha (Customer Support)
actions: Prioritize investigation and resolution of critical app failures and data display inaccuracies to restore user trust and functionality.
Review the fee structure and communication around charges to ensure transparency and address user concerns regarding profitability.
Implement a quality assurance program for customer support interactions to standardize service excellence and address negative feedback.
